name: Five Nights At Cool Bean Team
name_original: Five Nights At Cool Bean Team
description:
Can you survive 5 nights of CBT? (Cool Bean Team)

In this Five Nights at Freddy's inspired game, you will have to protect yourself from 3 idiots who are trying to come and kill whoever is in the room you are sitting in. Can you stop them, using the limited power that you have?

The first few nights might lead you to a false sense of security, but trust me, as the week goes on, you'll need all the help you can get!

Maybe you'll even stay for a sixth, or even seventh night....
